abstract: When companies combine, one area they often look at to save money is in ad spending. But it is unclear at this point how much AT&T would reduce its spending on advertising if its proposed merger with T-Mobile is approved.
snippet: When companies combine, one area they often look at to save money is in ad spending. But it is unclear at this point how much AT&T would reduce its spending on advertising if its proposed merger with T-Mobile is approved.
lead_paragraph: The advertising implications for the acquisition of T-Mobile by AT&T will take some time to unfold.

headline.main: Ad Spending Could Change With AT&T Deal
